Package cams.post_menus

Interface PostViewerUI

All Superinterfaces:
DashboardState
All Known Subinterfaces:
PostApproverUI, PosterUI, PostReplierUI
All Known Implementing Classes:
ApproverUI, EnquirerUI, ReplierUI, SuggesterUI
public interface PostViewerUI extends DashboardState
Interface defining the UI actions for viewing posts. This interface extends DashboardState to include functionalities for viewing posts.

    Method

    int

    Displays the posts for a given user.

      int view(User user)
      Displays the posts for a given user.

      The number of posts displayed.
